sentences.sContent: The computer has dealt a mortal blow to traditional printing methods.
sentences.sCn: 计算机 给了传统的印刷方法一记致命的打击。

sentences.sContent: Our health service is in mortal danger.
sentences.sCn: 我们的公共医疗保健服务岌岌可危。

synos.tran: 凡人的；[医]致死的；终有一死的；不共戴天的

words.tran: 死亡数，死亡率；必死性，必死的命运

trans.tranCn: 必有一死的；致命的；极大的
trans.tranOther: something very serious that may cause the end of something
